name: Atlantic Quest
synopsis: Immerse yourself in the kingdom of the seas and help free the ocean's inhabitants from an oil spill. Traverse 120 exciting levels in the popular Match 3 style. Choose how to align three identical objects with each other. You can swap objects, form chains or tap on groups. If you get stuck, four friends with special skills will help you out: a clever clown fish, a strong shark, a lively octopus and a crap with an explosive hobby. Take up the challenge and make the ocean shine once more! - 12 different scenarios in 120 levels - always choose from three Match 3 mechanisms - nifty Power-Ups - great graphics and elaborate animations
